title: r/Maliciouscompliance A Grocery Store Karen Got EXACTLY What She Asked For!
description: r/Maliciouscompliance Ever stand behind a Karen at a grocery store? They're always in such a hurry because their life is just SO important! This Karen gets pissy that the grocery store clerk isn't following all of the rules, even though this particular rule is a huge waste off time. The clerk happily complies with Karen and wastes the Karen's time by giving her exactly what she asked for!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
